code: import{SET_SELECTED_PRODUCT,ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_FROM_CART,INCREASE_IN_CART,DECREASE_IN_CART,SET_ACTIVATED_COUPON,SET_CART_EMPTY}from"../types";export var setSelectedProduct=function setSelectedProduct(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:payload});};};export var addToCart=function addToCart(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:payload});};};export var setCartEmpty=function setCartEmpty(){var cart=[];return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_CART_EMPTY,payload:cart});};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:REMOVE_FROM_CART,payload:payload});};};export var increaseInCart=function increaseInCart(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:INCREASE_IN_CART,payload:payload});};};export var decreaseInCart=function decreaseInCart(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:DECREASE_IN_CART,payload:payload});};};export var setActivatedCoupon=function setActivatedCoupon(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_ACTIVATED_COUPON,payload:payload});};};
